column1: 251999,Genetic Counsellor,,"Communicate detailed medical information to patients or family members
column3: Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column5: Advise patients of health conditions or treatments
column7: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
column9: Analyse test results to inform diagnosis or treatment
column11: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column15: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column17: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column19: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column21: Gather medical information from patient histories
column25: Refer patients to other health care practitioners or health resources
column27: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column31: Order medical diagnostic or clinical tests
column35: Advise others on health care issues
column37: Develop health care quality and safety procedures
column39: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
column41: Conduct health or safety training programs
